overview:
Michelle Garcia is a lender who truly cares to make a difference in your home loan or refinance process.

Established in 1996, Michelle Garcia has built a solid reputation in the Kitsap County area of Washington State as the go-to lender who has the solutions. Her tenacity and extensive product knowledge has enabled her to help clients achive home ownership when everyone else failed.

With the ability to originate and close loans in 49 states and with over 150 branch locations nationwide, Michelle can work with you where you are and help you where you are going. Whether it’s home refinancing, consolidation of loans, or just providing you with rates on mortgages, we are here to provide you a mortgage without obstacles whether you are in Kitsap County or not!
